item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different events and restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Gepetto's Grilled Pizza in Federal Hill in Depasquale Square!

So, in true, original P-Collective style, I was wandering around Depasquale Square recently and passed by this place. Big floor to ceiling doors open out onto a patio covered with flowers with tables and chairs to enjoy the summer evening and festive atmosphere of Federal Hill. Inside is a large bar serving up everything from beer and wine to cocktails with the doors offering a nice view out onto the patio and the summer air in. They are known for their grilled pizza and offer classes in a variety of Italian cuisine too. So, for those that have been mentioning Federal Hill and "the Square", we're going and here's your chance! Â  So let's check it out! And, see......you thought I forgot about Monday night!

http://www.geppettospizzeria.com/Menu.html

Hope to see you there!

Bring a friend!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright blue, gradated-dyed scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Geppetto's Grilled Pizza!
